amendment.description: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 relating to parental notification and opt-out of assessments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2162 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 64. Record Vote Number: 235.

action.text: Amendment SA 2162 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2089.
